subject: Poems Wanted
text:
Poems are still on the most wanted list,
 Hanging on ever post office wall!
 The crime they committed is expression
 of ones love for another.
 Such as father and mother, sister, or brother,
 and that's not all!
 Also! Poems wanted are guilty of mail fraud.
 Instead of simply verbalizing your appreciating for
 the kind and loving act of another.
 Poems wanted! was put on paper put in a white envelope stamped
 dropped in the mail box addressed to
 friend, mother, father, sister ,or
 brother!
 Poems wanted are still on the most wanted list.
 Still waiting to be caught by Another!
